<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# MatchVar Node Formatting

Represents matching with assignment into a local variable (i.e. `pattern => var`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

# MatchVar Formatting

## Fails because no tests are written

Before:

```ruby
case "foo"
in foo => bar
end
```

After:

```ruby
case "foo"
in foo => bar
end
```
